ing.item: Tomato; artichoke or spinach fettuccini; or any pasta of your choice
Pepper to taste (freshly ground is best)
Finely grated Parmesan cheese or any other cheese; finely grated

directions.step:
In a large pot, boil the pasta in 3 quarts of water. Add 1/2 cup cooking oil to keep pasta from sticking together. When soft to the bite (about 8 minutes), drain. In a large saucepan, melt the butter, add olive oil, salt and pepper. Add the Half and Half, meat and squash. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Toss the hot pasta with the sauce and cheese. Yield: 4 servings.
CATHERINE HIPP
NEW YORK, NY
